meanings.definition: A red or orange edible fruit of a shrub in the rose family.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe salmonberry from the bush.
meanings.sent2: The salmonberry bush was full of delicious fruit.
meanings.sent3: The salmonberry rolled off the table and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a salmonberry in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the salmonberry filled the air.

meanings.definition: A shrub of the rose family that produces red or orange edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The salmonberry shrub in the garden is blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new salmonberry bush in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a salmonberry and ran away.
meanings.sent4: The salmonberry bush stood out like a flame in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The birds chirped happily while feasting on the salmonberry.
